assetProfile.address2: 9th Floor Anant Kanekar Marg Station Road, Bandra (East)
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Housing Development and Infrastructure Limited engages in the real estate construction, development, and other related activities in India. Its residential projects include apartment complexes, towers, and townships; commercial projects comprise office spaces and multiplex cinemas; and retail projects consists of shopping malls. The company also develops slum rehabilitation projects. Housing Development and Infrastructure Limited was incorporated in 1996 and is based in Mumbai, India.
